Name: Lower East Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Petite Sirah
Wine Description: Ripe summer blackberries and plums overwhelm both the nose and palate of this wine. Its trademark inky, jammy qualities are a barrage of black fruit and spice, adding layer upon layer of complexity. Notes of supple leather and toasty oak envelop the flavors through the finish, giving way to wisps of caramel and vanilla.

Name: Rubicon
Wine Description: The wine has an opaque deep ruby colour. Deep, dark fruit, cassis, plum, black cherry and pronounced minerality with graphite to the nose. Cedar smoke and cigar box bouquet.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pessimist Red Blend
Wine Description: The 2022 vintage delivers yet another bewitching blend with trademark Pessimist flair. An intensely aromatic nose begins with fragrances of blueberry, boysenberry and black plum. Deeper layers reveal lavender, truffle, cocoa and tamarind spice with hints of cherry pipe tobacco, leather, mint and smoked meats. A bright, vibrant palate offers generous flavors of black cherry, cranberry, crème de cassis and pomegranate. Notes of lilac, anise and black olive complement the rich fruit while the mouth is flooded with lush, silky textures. Lingering accents of blueberry and raspberry round out this elegantly balanced wine.

Name: Villa Nozzole Chianti Classico
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Côtes-du-Rhône Réserve Rouge
Wine Description: Deep ruby color with beautiful purple highlights. Still lactic strand, the nose shows 's intense aromas of candied red fruit. Soft, round structured freshness.

Name: Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon Napa Valley
Wine Description: Ever popular in the Vivino wine community, Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon embodies the rich heritage of California winemaking, showcasing a harmonious blend of bold flavor and refined elegance renowned in this area. With its luscious dark fruit and oaky notes, along with smooth, velvety tannins, the Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon offers a captivating embodiment of the prestigious Napa Valley terroir. The Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon 2018 is particularly popular, and has earned itself almost 4,000 Vivino ratings, where the Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 has been given the accolade of featuring in the top 25 Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignons in the United States right now. Offering an aesthetically pleasing dark, jewel-like red colour and appetising aroma, this full bodied wine opens up nicely with a smooth yet bold palate. The Chateau Buena Vista Cabernet Sauvignon pairs perfectly with beef, lamb, poultry and game such as deer and venison, making it a firm choice for dinner parties with hearty meat dishes. Its mouthfeel also complements mature and hard cheeses, making it a popular post-dinner accompaniment to a cheese board. Bon appétit!

Name: Reserve Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Argyle Reserve Pinot Noir is classic Oregon. Exacting in its fruit selection from the Willamette Valley's most luxurious vineyard sites, Argyle Reserve Pinot Noir has classic \"silky texture\" born of peak season ripeness, small batch handling and gentle aging in French oak for 16 months.

Name: Santa Maria Valley Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Vintner's Reserve Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Shiraz
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Clark & Telephone Vineyard Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chianti Rùfina Riserva
Wine Description: Ruby-red with good consistencey. The nose opens with a strong fruit component of blackberry, blueberry and cherry. Sweet notes of cotton candy and spicy notes of cloves and nutmeg follow. The tannins are dense, but not harsh. The palate is warm and smooth, lovely persistence and remarkable taste-olfactory correspondence.

Name: A Lisa
Wine Description: Dense violet and plum color. Dark ripe blackberry, cherry and cocoa on the nose. Full bodied with fruit notes of bitter cherry and cassis with aromas of spice and ­a hint of violets. Balanced, persistent tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Fresh fruit aromas of cherry, raspberry, and plum are followed by hints of violet, spice, mineral, and pepper. This wine offers crisp acidity upon entry unfolding with juicy flavors of strawberry, raspberry and black fruits and leather. Tannins are supple creating a lingering finish with cola and smokiness.

Name: Ripasso
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Serie A Malbec
Wine Description: Intense and lively red purple color. Intense red ripe fruit aromas such as prunes and cherries with black pepper and tobacco. Can also detect chocolate, cherry liqueur and spicy notes. Soft and velvety entry, firm tannins with lovely juicy finish.

Name: Tempranillo
Wine Description: Clean, bright and lively wine with attractive cherry red color. Varietal aromas of red and black fruits such as raspberry, cherry and blackberry fruits, well integrated with notes of almond and hazelnut. Fresh, round and well structured.

Name: Red Semi-Sweet
Wine Description: N/A

Name: California Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A pleasing mix of black cherry, cola, strawberry, plum, and soft tannins.

Name: Bin 8 Cabernet - Shiraz
Wine Description: There is a dense core of black cherry, dark chocolate and black cherry liqueur. Across the palate, splashes of chocolate and mint combine with hints of rosemary and warmed spice. Some cherry, toasty notes are evident from the balanced, integrated oak. This wine has great balance with great integration between good fruit and oak.

Name: Haut-Médoc
Wine Description: Great intensity. Very deep colour with garnet reflections. The nose is very open and inviting with soft oaky notes of vanilla and spice bringing out the red fruits such as blackcurrant and black cherry. The attack on the palate is smooth and fresh. The tannic development is of great quality, with fatness giving real mouthfeel. The lightly oaked fruit aromas are very elegant and contribute to the fine aromatic persistence.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep red with lush cherry, black currant, and blackberry aromas and a touch of tar and smoke. The highly concentrated flavors are framed by firm tannins. Smooth texture and masks the firm tannic structure that lies below and only appears on the lingering finish.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Malbec (Clásico)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Beautiful reddish-purple color. The aromas are a mix of freshly crushed black cherries and subtle coffee and vanilla notes, just enough to frame the exuberant fruit. On the palate, the flavors of cherries and spice are obvious, and the jammy fruit quality just keeps coming on, with hints of spice and sandalwood lurking in the background.

Name: Conscious Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: The Boxer Shiraz
Wine Description: It is astounding, so rich and so smooth and so powerful. Succulent berry flavours with luscious chocolate layers as well as licorice and spice. The deep dark colour of the wine matches the deep flavours of the wine.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: A wealth of aromas such as fresh cranberries, maraschino cherries, and orange zest. The palate is round and juicy with lively acidity, and a touch of sweet, toasty oak on the finish

Name: Matilda Nieves Mencia
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Les Launes Crozes-Hermitage
Wine Description: To the eye, the dress is dark garnet. The nose, fruity, is marked by intense aromas of cassis, plum and violet. This wine, full and round in the mouth, presents a powerful tannic structure which gives it a good aging potential.

Name: Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This is a rich, layered and mouth-filling wine with ripe, integrated tannins and a seductive fine-grained finish. Dark aromas of toffee, hickory, bacon, cedar and smoke are contrasted by more vibrant elements of red currant and spearmint. On the palate, rich black currant and blueberry flavors dominate, underscored by subtler notes of earth and oak.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Right notes of sour cherry and cranberry are framed with hints of toasted bread and smoke. Ginger and earthy notes of sage follow up on the mid-palate. Nicely structured with firm acidity, red raspberry and notes of cocoa and toasty oak linger on the finish.

Name: Gran Reserva Vendimia Seleccionada
Wine Description: Dense, deep ruby red colour. On the nose, intense aromas of ripe fruits and cherries blend with slightly toasted vanillin notes. Fresh, full and fleshy in the mouth, this wine delivers superb tannins that highlight its structure and complexity. An impressive personality that comes through on tasting: richness, body, elegance and intense, long-lasting, balanced flavours to delight the palate.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Deep and dark red color with purple highlights. Intense and complex nose of small red fruit and black fruit fragrances. Supple and smooth, well balanced, with long lasting notes of berries on the finish. Nicely concentrated, with pleasant mellow tannins.

Name: Vint Merlot
Wine Description: Our Merlot displays all the attributes that make this variety so popular: bright aromas and flavors of smooth cherry, plum and strawberry with hints of cedar, black olive and spice—supported by a supple texture with fine-grained tannins and bright acidity.

Name: Bordeaux Supérieur
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Modus Toscana
Wine Description: Ruby red colour. Intense and intriguing on the nose, initial aromas of mature red and black fruits, such as cherries, plums, and small black berries, typical of Sangiovese, are complemented by hints of spices, sweet tobacco, and refined balsamic notes. Full bodied with a modern Super Tuscan style, rich with silky tannins and flavors of mature blackberry fruit and cocoa. Vibrant fresh fruit flavors.

Name: Reserva 5 Año
Wine Description: This elegant wine comes from 50 year old vineyards from the Burgos region of Ribera del Duero. With 18 months of mostly French barrels and another 18 months in bottle, it delivers a perfect blend of ripe fruits and wood flavors.

Name: Viña Cubillo
Wine Description: Bright ruby in colour. Fresh and slight notes of liquorice with consistent texture and persistent aroma. Smooth, fresh and persistent.

Name: Limited Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Solas Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Wine Description: It has a bright ruby red colour and a rich texture. Aromas of cherry and plum follow through to a full-bodied, with soft, round tannins and a flavourful finish.

Name: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Trois Cepages Arbois
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barolo (Tradizione)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Vel'uveyra Mencía
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Rich and lush with a striking garnet hue. The wine is immediately captivating with its delicious aroma of crushed blackberry and notes of cassis.Deep berry flavors explode in the mouth in a delightful integration of varietal complexity. This is a big wine to linger over, impressively balanced with velvety tannins on the finish.

Name: Barolo Riserva
Wine Description: Color: Deep, ruby red with orange reflections which increase with age Bouquet: Intense with notes of rose, leather, tobacco and emerging hints of violet Flavor: Ample and complex with a soft, persistent finish

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: The deeply perfumed, with red raspberry, wild blackberry, black licorice, orange oil, violets, coriander, and slate on the nose. The palate is silky and plush, with red and black fruits, iron, cardamom, and black peppercorn.

Name: Pinot Noir Bourgogne
Wine Description: A beautiful ruby color. This wine has pleasant, fresh, red-fruit aromas on the nose, which we find again on the palate. It has a rich and very ripe substance, with fine and round tannins. This is a very well-structured and pleasing wine.

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella
Wine Description: Elegant and floral wine showing notes of sweet cherries with scents of violet, licorice, sweet tobacco and exotic spices.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Y3
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pelissa Vineyard Zinfandel
Wine Description: With elegance, this single vineyard offers layers of complex aromas and flavors. Bursting with bright, dark fruits and hints of vanilla, black pepper, and violet undertones. This wine is balanced with intricate oak essences. A smooth, luscious, and velvet finish that coats your palate will keep you sipping for more.

Name: Allomi Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Our winemaker produces a distinctive wine notable for its depth and complexity. This wine expresses a lush, firm texture, with good acidity, firm tannins and distinctive fruit forward flavors.

Name: Felino Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of black cherry, black currant, briar patch, hard candy and pencil shavings on the nose. Bright and luscious on the palate, with black cherry, blackberry, plum, abundant dark chocolate and subtle notes of earl grey tea and black pepper keeping it balanced. Viscous and round, with plush tannins and a delicious finish.

Name: Parts & Labor
Wine Description: N/A

Name: I Tratturi Rosso
Wine Description: Deep ruby red with violet reflections; intense and wide to the nose, with red fruit scent. Full bodied, fresh and balanced.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chiles Canyon Vineyards Zinfandel
Wine Description: Dark cherry and raspberry flavours with tinges of bay leaf and clove. Accompanies wood grilled vegetables and marbled meats.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bordeaux
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Monograph Agiorgitiko
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Médoc
Wine Description: One of the showpieces of the Medoc, this structured and firm wine has strong Cabernet flavors that give both dry tannins and juicy black currant fruits. Still youthful, this balanced wine is likely to age well.

Name: Le Petit Haut Lafitte Pessac-Léognan
Wine Description: Produced mainly from young Cabernet Sauvignon vines on the Château Smith Haut Lafitte vineyard, this is a solid, dark and dense wine. It has rich black-currant flavors that are cut by acidity and firm tannins.

Name: Sonoma County Merlot
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Finca San Martín Crianza
Wine Description: It has medium-depth, cherry-red, with a pink rim; clean and bright. High aromatic intensity, with prevailing notes of ripe fruit, strawberries and redcurrants against a balsamic, aniseed, liquorice and cedar background from painstaking barrel ageing.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Riserva Ducale Oro Chianti Classico (Gran Selezione Gold)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Marquis de Calon Saint-Estèphe
Wine Description: The estate’s Second Wine is a different expression of the Calon terroir. With an average proportion of 75% Merlot in the blend, it is enjoyable to drink in the immediate term and exhibits a warm and velvety character. It is aged in barrels, a third of which are new, for up to 18 months.

Name: Pinotage
Wine Description: Intense, rich coffee and chocolate aromas with nuances of ripe mulberry, plum and Maraschino cherries. The sweet aroma of vanilla follows through on the palate and melds with the soft, luscious tannins.

Name: Los Conejos Malditos Tempranillo Carbónico
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Empreintes Cornas
Wine Description: Ripe blackberry, cherry cola, candied violet and woodsmoke aromas show very good clarity and depth. The tannins are ripe and powerful, but perfectly correct for a wine with this type of structure.

Name: Cumulus
Wine Description: Intense cherry red, clean, and bright tones. Good adhesion and density, thick and abundant legs. Intense, complex and elegant character, perfectly balanced with oak fruitiness and delicate spicy touches. Young notes of red fruits, raspberries, cherries, plums and hints of cassis. In the character delicate spicy notes of rosemary and pepper they appear discreetly giving personality to the wine. Good attack, presence of marked structure, the character of the wood is seen in wine and good ripening grape fruit. Long stay, rich acidity that brings freshness with slightly bitter touches of firm tannins that make it up. Medium-bodied, dry taste.

Name: Marsannay
Wine Description: It has reminiscent of blackberries, prunes and blackcurrants, while ageing lends them a musky odour. The wines are usually tannic and very supple. It will be a perfect accompaniment to roast, grilled or braised red meat.

Name: Gran Coronas Reserva Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Opaque cherry red wine. Fruity (jammy strawberry and raspberry) with lovely spicy (black pepper) and balsamic notes. Intense, deep, with very ripe, velvety tannins from aging in wood (toasted oak).

Name: California Red Wine
Wine Description: Rich and concentrated, this full-bodied wine displays alluring layers of blackberry and ripe cherry, along with hints of spearmint and caramel. On the palate, the voluptuous fruit flavors are underscored by plush tannins that carry the wine to a long, silky finish.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Vivid ruby red in colour. Evident notes of red fruit and hints of cherries. Smooth and well structured with a fruity aftertaste.

Name: La Petite Grace Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Deep, intense garnet color in the glass with aromas of black cherries, brown sugar, and mocha. Round, soft, and full-bodied with excellent weight in the mid-palate.

Name: Tre
Wine Description: Brancaia Tre is a blend of 80% Sangiovese and 20% Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. It has fresh cranberry-cherry floral fruit nose flecked with liquorice and tobacco.

Name: Blue Eyed Boy Shiraz
Wine Description: Reminds of taking a bite from a blueberry muffin. A mouthful full of rich, creamy vanilla followed by an explosion of blueberries. A powerful wine with vibrant dark berry fruits, plum, and chocolate cream. A silky texture is laced with luscious layers of fresh fruit, spice, coffee and a seamless finish that lasts for eternity.

Name: Bolgheri Il Seggio
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Bunkhouse Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Warm and inviting nose that offers aromas of black current, graphite and loam. Lovely well-rounded attack. Refreshing acidity plays nicely against the tannins allowing for soft and harmonious flavors of just-ripened plum and oak-spiced vanilla.

Name: Syrah
Wine Description: It has big, powerful wine,hits the palate with dark fruit, mocha, spices, new leather and cedar. The style is decidedly ample and textured, with layers of intense black fruit.

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Barbaresco
Wine Description: Intensely red wine with slight hints of garnet, a complex nose of ripe red fruit and spicy overtones, and a warm, mouth-filling flavour with soft tannins, great elegance and an excellent finish.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Fruity and flavourful wine, deep burgundy in colour and exticing aromas of red berries with subtle notes of tobacco. Black cherry and red fruit flavours are complemented by light herbaceous notes leading into a soft, balanced finish.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Dry, light-bodied and silky, with tantalizing cherry, cranberry, anise and sandalwood flavours.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has solid tannins and jammy fruit, with aromas and flavors of black cherry, currant, dried cranberry and black peppercorn followed by a trio of clove, earth and light toast.

Name: Barrel Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Ruby red color, delicious peppery aromas and juicy flavors of cherry, blackcurrant and raspberry. The smooth and easy drinking finish pairs perfectly with grilled or roasted red meats as well as poultry, pork and lamb dishes.

Name: Red
Wine Description: Aromas introduces a fresh palate with just the right amount of creamy, oaky weight. Rooty, spicy cherry and cassis flavors are ripe and generous, while a warm finish tastes spicy and perfectly ripe.

Name: Barolo Bussia
Wine Description: It has color is deep garnet red and the bouquet is fine and pleasing, with intense scents of spiced rose and licorice. The flavor is dry, warm, full bodied and balanced with pronounced tannins and a persistent aftertaste. A wine particularly adapted for aging.

Name: Éclat de Calcaire Bourgogne Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Il Nero di Casanova Terre di Pisa Sangiovese
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Mount Hermon Red
Wine Description: Complex red and black fruit characters with aromatic spice notes and hints of fresh herbs. With medium body and satisfying flavor, this is a wine to enjoy all week long.
